docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

apis.short_description: Perform an Incremental Update on one or more Content View Versions

params.name: content_view_version_environments
params.validator: Must be an Array of nested elements

params.name: content_view_version_id
params.description: Content View Version Ids to perform an incremental update on. May contain composites as well as one or more components to update.

params.name: environment_ids
params.description: The list of environments to promote the specified Content View Version to (replacing the older version)
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: description
params.description: The description for the new generated Content View Versions

params.name: resolve_dependencies
params.description: If true, when adding the specified errata or packages, any needed dependencies will be copied as well. Defaults to true

params.name: propagate_all_composites
params.description: If true, will publish a new composite version using any specified content_view_version_id that has been promoted to a lifecycle environment

params.name: errata_ids
params.description: Errata ids to copy into the new versions
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: package_ids
params.description: Package ids to copy into the new versions
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: deb_ids
params.description: Deb Package ids to copy into the new versions
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: puppet_module_ids
params.description: Puppet Module ids to copy into the new versions
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: update_hosts
params.description: After generating the incremental update, apply the changes to the specified hosts. Only Errata are supported currently.

params.name: search
params.description: Search string for host to perform an action on

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to perform an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: ids
params.description: List of host ids to exclude and not run an action on
params.validator: Must be an array of any type
